category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_req_viewer_page_size
preference.preference_description: This is a user preference that defines the number of requirements that load together within the Active Workspace Requirements Documentation tab. Valid values are: 0 : All requirement in a specification load together in the Active Workspace Requirements Documentation tab. n : 'n' is the number of specification requirements that load together; the remaining requirements also load as consecutive sets of 'n'
